title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Highly motivated Full Stack Developer with hands-on experience in Java, Python, and SQL, eager to contribute strong problem-solving and analytical skills to a dynamic team embracing DevOps culture. Proficient in Unix commands and version control systems (Git), with a foundational understanding of servers, virtualization, and networking. Committed to continuous learning and applying coding skills in Core Java and Spring Boot, demonstrating enthusiasm and an open mind to new ideas to deliver quality output.

bullets: Architected a full-stack AI interview coaching platform using Python (FastAPI) for the RESTful API backend and MongoDB, demonstrating hands-on Python development and database management skills.
Integrated advanced AI APIs (OpenAI GPT-4, Whisper) to analyze video/audio data, showcasing strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
items.name: Intervue.ai – AI-Powered Mock Interview Platform

bullets: Engineered a full-stack job portal leveraging Core Java (JSP, Servlets) for the backend and MySQL for database management, demonstrating hands-on Java coding and SQL proficiency.
Developed and integrated a Resume Optimizer and ATS, significantly improving candidate-job match accuracy by 40% through analytical problem-solving.
items.name: Hirearchy – Role-Based Job Portal

bullets: Developed a Python GUI application incorporating Random Forest and rule-based models for phishing detection, showcasing hands-on Python development and analytical skills.

Achieved over 90% detection accuracy on real-world datasets and managed the complete application lifecycle, from design to testing, demonstrating problem-solving and foundational release planning awareness.
items.name: Phishing URL Detector (ML-based)

items.title: Winner, HackMITWPU Ideathon 2025
items.summary: Pitched AI-based Threat Scanner; recognized for innovation.

items.title: Google Cybersecurity Certified
items.summary: Trained in web, network, and data protection fundamentals.

items.summary: Built automatic street lamp prototype using LDR and microcontroller.
